channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024021234
item.description:
Report X-2024021234

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-08
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, and brought to QA. DescribePack: Both bottles had loose caps and were leaking from broken seals. Potential hazardous label covered by shipping label. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, and brought to QA. DescribePack: Cap on bottle of LYSOLÂ® Mold & Mildew Remover With Bleach was cracked and leaking. No inner packing. Liquid had soaked other, non-hazardous contents in the box. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report X-2024020861
item.description:
Report X-2024020861

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-22T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-29
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was brought to QA post spill. Box was soiled. Inside were 12 bottles of cleaning solution. One had a loose cap and was missing about half of it's liquid. DescribePack: Twist plastic cap was loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: tightened cap
